title: veTri vElan porppadam
sahitya:
veTri vElan porppadam paTri gati peru manamE


anupallavi

  shaTrumE sankaTam aTra peru vAzhvu pera naTruNai tarum oru karpakat-taru pOnra


caraNam    shaTrumE salippurAda peTra tAyinaip-pOl uTra samayattil urutuNaiyAi nirppOn
vaTrAp-parivuDanE vaNangum aDiyArkku vAri aruL vazhangum sIriya pugazh uDaiyOn
